Package match

Class Match

java.lang.Object
match.Match
public class Match extends Object
This Class defines a Match in where the player team debates against an oppositions team based on a moot

    • getStylePreferenceBonus

      public int getStylePreferenceBonus(Athlete athlete)
      Calculates the style preference bonus of a given athlete(speaker) +2 if the athletes style preference is equal to the style of the moot -1 if the athletes style preference is not equal to the style of the moot
      Parameters:
      athlete - a given athlete
      Returns:
      stylePreferenceBonus a bonus used when calculating a speakers individual points

    • playerTeamAthleteEffects

      public ArrayList<Athlete> playerTeamAthleteEffects()
      subtracts 3 stamina from each of the players speakers and checks if an athletes stamina has reached 0 if stamina = 0 the athlete is set to injured.
      Returns:
      injuredList a list of injured athletes

    • calculatePlayerSpeakerPoints

      public double[] calculatePlayerSpeakerPoints()
      calculates the points of each speaker in the players team.
      Returns:
      playerPointsArray an array containing the points of each of the players speakers

    • calculateOpposingSpeakerPoints
